titleStmt.title: By the Lord Deputie and Councell. A proclamation for the banishment of Iesuites and priests, &c.
Proclamations. 1624-01-21
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Deputy (1622-1629 : Falkland)
Falkland, Henry Cary, Viscount, d. 1633.

notesStmt.note: The roman numeral date is made with turned C's; the year date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
